name: Chef Smile diner dash
description:
Join the exciting, chef cooking game craze! Prep, cook, and serve tasty Thai food alongside Chef Smile as she tries to save her Grandmother's Thai street cart. Earn achievements all while expanding your culinary and restaurant management skills. Play anywhere, anytime.

Create a restaurant empire alongside Chef Smile:

· Utilize your time management skills as you build up your restaurant and bakery

· Help Chef Smile manager her restaurants and bakery by cooking hundreds of different Thai food recipes

· Grow from a simple cart full of Thai food to an upgraded, fancy restaurant

· There are a variety of Thai foods waiting for you to cook up!

· Earn in-game coins and gold by accomplishing achievements

· Make in-app purchases to assist you in getting to the next level by upgrading your cooking tools and restaurant so you can serve your clients better

· There are currently 3 stores with 30 levels within the game and more to come soon

· Invite your friends to join in on the fun and share your achievements on your social accounts!

Restaurant Management is key in this game, so stay focused as you are sure to get addicted while improving your Thai cooking skills.

*DISCLAIMER: While the app is completely free to play, there is some additional content that may be purchased in-game. If you don't want to utilize this feature, please feel free to continue playing freely.
